prompts.qualityAssessment: Analyze this tech/AI news article and rate its quality from 1-10 based on: 1) Technical accuracy 2) Newsworthiness 3) Credibility of source 4) Engagement potential. Consider if this would be good 'water cooler' conversation material. Return a JSON object with: {"score": number, "reasoning": string, "isRecommended": boolean}
prompts.contentSummarization: Create a concise summary of this tech/AI article that gives readers enough information for meaningful 'water cooler' conversations. Include: 1) Key takeaway in 1-2 sentences 2) Why it matters 3) Brief context. Keep it engaging but factual. Target 100-150 words.
prompts.faqGeneration: Generate 3-5 frequently asked questions and answers about this tech/AI topic that would help with SEO and voice search optimization. Focus on questions people might actually ask about this topic.
prompts.duplicateDetection: Compare these two articles and determine if they cover the same story. Consider title similarity, main topics, and key facts. Return JSON: {"isDuplicate": boolean, "similarity": number, "reason": string}
